page.title: 17Armed Forces
page.content: Many of the adults in our area work in the village of Leuchars,8 miles away from Gauldry.Leuchars is the home of an R.A.F.base and one of Britain's first line defence bases.My dad works there as a chief technician._ He works in a hangar and there is a great deal of noise from the aircraft.The aircraft can often be seen flying over the village of Gauldry.They are mainly Phantom jets.We also often see Wessex helicopters flying over.There is a rescue base in Leuchars and in winter especially,they are often called out to assist hill _ walkers. by Stuart Foreman. ------------------
